lead_paragraph: The holdup is the latest in a series of robberies targeting wealthy tourists and famous visitors in and around the French capital.

headline.print_headline: Qatari Sisters Lose Millions in Valuables in Paris Heist
headline.main: Paris Highway Robbers Target Qatari Sisters in $5.3 Million Heist

snippet: The holdup is the latest in a series of robberies targeting wealthy tourists and famous visitors in and around the French capital....
abstract: Pair of wealthy Qatari sisters are held up on highway near Paris, latest in series of robberies targeting wealthy tourists and famous visitors around city; attacks are blow to tourism industry still suffering effects of 2015 terrorist attacks.
